website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but steam deep cleans very quickly. Unit is solidly constructed, too, and ideal for someone wanting a powerful machine that is portable.
pros: Portable and ultra-fine steam deep cleans skin
Short session times due to fine steam
cons: A bit expensive, can't be used with essential oils and making warranty claims is cumbersome

customer_reviews.title: fragile plastic water re-filler broke.
customer_reviews.text: After two months of using this product, The plastic water refilled broke on me after two months of using it. This happens as I remove it out so I can refill the water. There was no force use. I'm very sad as the actual mist itself works. Below is the Picture of the re-filler for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good one, I like it very much, but the plastic water refilled broke , how to do?can I buy the plastic water?where I can buy?
customer_reviews.author: Jinsong Peng

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the home facial
customer_reviews.text: It is very simple and easy to use, fill up the water, one touch up, then enjoy the steam. The first time use, it did have a little bit of chemical smell, but not strong though. I think that is normal when it got heated up at the first time. no smells after the first use, I have no complaints on that. One thing that bothers me is, even filling up water to the full level, can only last maximum of 6 mins, that is not enough time for me to enjoy the steam. Will get fully satisfied if it can last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Works great but..
customer_reviews.text: Works great as hot steamer, but the water tank is quite small, lasts about 9-10 minutes only. Wish it was bigger. Although it does what it's promised to do without any issues, I think it's overpriced. At the end of the day it is just a steamer with on-off switch no other function. I would have given 5 star if the price was bit less.
customer_reviews.author: nao

customer_reviews.title: my new add in to my favorite skin clearing routine
customer_reviews.text: i really recommend this steamer to whomever has to do make up every single day or even just sun screen. great for cleaning skin, i use it for 3 mins when pore all opened up and start to apply my cleansing foam so the bubbles can take away all dirt and oils. you will be able to see significant clearer and brighter skin the next day when you wake up. size is very portable and light weight. definitely a 5 stars product.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Broken easily
customer_reviews.text: It broken in 2 months with regular using (4times/week)..the problem in the beginning is half tank of water cannot flow down naturally, only can be shaken to flow down, Now the machinn only work for 1 mins then stop steaming, even the annoying sound is gone, no sure what cause this problem... Regreating to purchase this one on sale, not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed! This steamer puts out hardly any steam at all. Think carefully about whether it’s more important to you to save money and buy something relatively inexpensive or to spring for something that is a professional grade steamer. I was unable to get my money back because I was unable to use this steamer for the first tine until a couple months after purchase due to a death in the family. So unfair!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Long

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Except for Chemical Smell in Steam
customer_reviews.text: I hesitate to give this 3 stars as it's a great product except for the chemical smell during use. To me, chemical smells = plastic carcinogens which I do NOT like for obvious reasons. I've used it four times so far, each time with distilled water, and the water mist still smells like chemicals. I hope this goes away eventually or I may have to stop using it!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good portable facial steamer, Easy to use. the only Thing I font like is You can only steam for six minutes before you have to add more water.And the price is a little high I will recommend adding this steamer to your wishlist buying it when it’s on sale
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Think outside of the box
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this when I can’t breath. The steam opens my sinuses up. I know that’s not it’s purpose but it’s the reason I purchased it. It cuts down on the boiling of water placing the water into a bowel with my face over the steam for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this steamer at least twice a week to give myself at-home facials. Easy to use and works great. Highly recommend over the cheap imitations.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing steamer. Steam comes out almost as soon as you start it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: You need to compare more product to see which has it
customer_reviews.text: I felt it's a little bit expensive compared to other product that has the same function. I only used 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: YangStacey Chen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this over 130 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Why I bought this?! It's identical to other Panasonic facial steamers which are 30 dollars cheaper. Everyone who are interested in this should check the price of Panasonic EH-SA33. It's same but cheaper! BTW,in China, same product costs only 110 dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Not what we hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage son. He says it’s not helping with his facial cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great device for glowing skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Opens your pores quickly and is ver easy to use. Part of my daily skincare. Really help deep clean and help me Glow
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it twice a week right before I use a mask. Steam doesn't last long because the area you but the water (can't use tap or bottled water, distilled water works) is small. You can refill it for longer steam time.
customer_reviews.author: Sueboo

customer_reviews.title: water tank is too small..
customer_reviews.text: I had to refill every 3 mins if I want to use more time, that's a bit annoying but it's work good!
customer_reviews.author: Ln

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Device.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. This thing help me cleaning my large pores, I use it once every other week.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA GABRIELA ROA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good machine
customer_reviews.text: It is good machine, easy to use, but it smells not good at the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and arrived quickly. I use it weekly. Very simple, just add water, turn it on and enjoy! Facials made simple and much cheaper than going to a salon.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: great personal steamer
customer_reviews.text: Strong steam and perfect for weekly facials. It may smell like tin at first so I rubbed some passion flower oil on the pink part of the structure. Also works if you have a sinus headaches.
customer_reviews.author: john meany

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: One month into my purchase, the product stopped sending out steam like before. No excessive use followed the instructions from the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Xin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Glowy skin!
customer_reviews.text: Glowy skin awaits! Best product before putting on masks or moisturizer. Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.author: Megan McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The moment I turned it on the I felt so relaxing. Skin is very hydrated the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Hiding in the stars

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic face steamer
customer_reviews.text: I like to use it once a week, 6 minutes is just enough for my Asian face. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I am very happy with it, but I have not had experience with the cheaper models in order to say whether the price difference was justified.
customer_reviews.author: JDLRC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Broke my face out. So disappointed and it was sooo expensive
customer_reviews.author: Adrian bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I keep it next to my bed- use steamer very often
customer_reviews.author: P Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Broke very soon
customer_reviews.text: It broke after a few uses, like what was described in other reviews. So strange.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace Panasonic EH-SA64 which I love very much, but then it broke down. This steamer does not work as well. This item is just like a regular steamer. My pores dont react as well and after steaming my face, still in regular size. Not shrinking at all.
customer_reviews.author: bishibushi

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Working well so far! Love the size, being very portable, and it packs a lot of steam. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this steamer! I was sceptical at first, but it's made a HUGE difference in my skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Moogly - Tamara Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Facial streamer
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is wonderful. Very gentile steam flow. Notice a great difference in my skin. Would definately give this steamer two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: there is some noise come from the machine, i don't think that is normal!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a great product; however, only time will tell if it is worth that much more than the very similar Ivation unit. I don't use the unit but the person who does is very happy with the amount of steam and the temperature. At this price it is going to have to hold up a long time but I don't think you will be disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 4America

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first month, I used it only twice a week and now it just shoots out hot water on my face or no steam at all. I take care of it and it has never been dropped so it's disappointing to pay this much money for it to work for only a month and not have an return or replacement option and I've only owned it for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Although a beautiful machine, after 2-3 uses I DID start smelling ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this cannot be different from the other cheaper models out there. Although a beautiful machine, after 2-3 uses I DID start smelling a funny plastic smell in the steam, and the steam was inconsistent & sputtering. I'm the kind of person who ALWAYS pays more for brand name or quality, but this really proved me wrong. Seems to have the same exact issues people complained about on the generic models that cost $40. Thankful for return policy!!
customer_reviews.author: KatyinCali

customer_reviews.title: Fine for short steams with lesser steam output
customer_reviews.text: The Panasonic Facial Steamer is durable and feels well made. However, the steam output seemed minimal compared to other steamers. I've tried a few different models of steamers, and the Panasonic seemed to provide the least amount of steam. Also, the water tank is very small. I prefer a facial steamer with a bigger water tank capacity, longer steaming duration, and more steam. The Panasonic is nice if you prefer a short steam with a more mild steam output.
customer_reviews.author: Shopamazon

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the GREATEST product ever. I bought it for my daughter (secretly bought it for myself). I love how it feels and it is so relaxing. I use it almost every night. It helps relax me and makes my skin feel really good. I wish the water container held more water so I could use it longer!!! It is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Belly Laugh Living

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The steam only takes seconds to start, and it's a really nice mist that covers most of your face. I prefer this in the morning & at night instead of using the hot washcloth to open the pores because it's so much faster, I was wasting so much water waiting for my tap water to get hot. The shipping speed was phenomenal! I ordered it on Thursday and was expecting it on Monday, but it came Friday. One day! And I live in Canada! I was so surprised.
customer_reviews.author: ravensara23

customer_reviews.title: Must have for skin care.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Panasonic steamer in 8 years.my first one still works but it was made different and this update is much better to use. Both are nano steamers but this design is way better. Its 1 piece w a pop in water filler. Love it. It's the best one bc it has nano steam that clears breakouts almost immidietly. I use it everyday. It will clear out bacteria from your pores. It's the absolute best skin care product you could ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small water tank, but works
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this twice, so I can't comment on how well it holds up over time. But, the small tank runs for about 6-10 mins, I had to refill it while cleaning my face and doing my facial, which was annoying. It produced good hot steam and I like it besides having to refill it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This facial steamer is amazing. It worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This facial steamer is amazing. It worth the money. I recommend this to your guys! I'm pleased with the purchase. It makes my skin better. It clears my pores. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Slidelide

customer_reviews.title: one of the best beauty tool
customer_reviews.text: i just love how it feels after I use this. It feels all my pores are open and time to do some scrubbing to remove the impurities of your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is as good as it has been described. Just do not use this in summer, waaaaay toooooo hooooot hahahhha.
customer_reviews.author: wenyue li

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for putting steam for cold and runny noise. It worked and its easy to use. My 8 years old do it on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Raghu kolukuluri

customer_reviews.title: Nice steamer for face
customer_reviews.text: Nice steamer for face, but it only last for 4 min at a time then u have to refill. It steams about 65% of the fave at once, u have to keep rotating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving this steamer ...!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it - the steam doesn't have that nasty burned smell. The mist is nice , it's very fine. Feels good when it hits your skin. For 6 min. It can really open up your pores. will update my review in the couple weeks of using this steamer:
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Helps my Sinus...
customer_reviews.text: Helps my Sinus... I am using it for past month or so (daily) and definitely has improvement in my sinus
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item because I have a very sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because I have a very sensitive skin and was advised not to use it. This warning should be posted for future buyers to read before ordering this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerLisalotte

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for a year now, still works ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year now, still works very well. Quite pricey but worth the buy, I can't really live without it. When I have the time, I sometimes use it twice a day. I purchased this steamer because at the time, steamers seemed quite dangerous, I've seen reviews of others cheaper steamers spouting hot water on people's faces YIKES! So I decided to go with this one. A negative is that it's expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Maus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Steamer but made in China
customer_reviews.text: Nice steamer! Too bad it's not made in Japan, and it's made in china, hopefully it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chiew

product_meta.title: Panasonic Spa-Quality Facial Steamer EH-SA31VP with Ultra-Fine Nano Ionic Steam to Moisturize and Promote Deep Pore Cleansing, Compact Design and One-Touch Operation, 6-Minute Steam Cycle
product_meta.description: The compact Panasonic Spa-Quality Facial Steamer EH-SA31VP with Nano Ionic Steam makes it simple and luxurious to enjoy beautifying spa-like facial sauna treatments at home, anytime you want. The simple push of a button on the face steamer generates warm, soothing waves of ionic steam particles thousands of times finer than ordinary steam to penetrate and moisturize the skin. In just 6 minutes, deep-cleaning nano-steam helps to relax and soften the skin and purge makeup, dirt and other impurities from the pores. Use the Panasonic facial steamer's versatile, purifying moisture as part of a regular skin care regimen to thoroughly cleanse facial skin for easier makeup application. Use the steamer face cleanser again at the end of the day or evening to gently soothe and refresh for thorough, effective cleansing and to help hydrate skin. The ES-SA31VP Panasonic Facial Steamer’s sleek, stylish, compact design smartly complements the bathroom, makeup table or dressing area décor. It’s simple facial sauna skin care that’s perfect for anyone and the ideal way to replenish the natural moisture in your skin to maintain a healthy, natural-looking complexion.
feature_bullets: SIX MINUTE SPA-QUALITY TREATMENT: The Panasonic Facial Steamer lets you enjoy relaxing, spa-like facial sauna treatments at home with a simple 6-minute steam cycle to soothe and refresh the skin

SOOTHING WAVE OF STEAM PARTICLES: The face steamer generates nano-sized steam particles which are thousands of times smaller than regular steam particles to penetrate, cleanse and significantly increase skin moisture
DEEP-CLEANSING MOISTURE: Quickly and gently removes makeup, dirt and other impurities from the skin with deep-cleaning facial steamer moisture for a healthy, natural-looking complexion

DAILY SKIN CARE REGIMEN: Use this steamer face cleanser as part of a regular morning skin care regimen to thoroughly cleanse the skin for easier makeup application or in the evening to soothe and refresh the skin for effective, deep-facial cleaning
SLEEK, STYLISH DESIGN: The Panasonic facial steamer's sleek, stylish design and compact size complements any bathroom, makeup table or dressing area décor
